entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deadlock in asynchronous DNS resolution #112663
  • Add Support for Brotli Compression with Shared Dictionaries in .NET #112656
  • Matrix4x4.CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView ArgumentOutOfRangeException #112655
  • Unhandled `AggregateException` caused by `StreamPipeWriter.FlushInternalAsync` #112651
  • [API Proposal]: Get wasm custom sections inside assembly #112649
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 22 Regressions on 2/13/2025 12:40:20 AM +00:00 #112657
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 24 Regressions on 2/14/2025 8:07:17 PM +00:00 #112658
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 6 Regressions on 2/11/2025 10:40:48 AM +00:00 #112659
  • Crash in Methodical_r1 on CET #112646
  • SerialPort ReadBufferSize cant set properly in Ubuntu #112643

Closed

  • Implement IPv6InterfaceStatistics #40411
  • Is it possible to create valid type for any genericParameter using TypeBuilder? #112317
  • JIT: Test failed global::JitTest_castclass_ldloc_cs.TestClass.TestEntryPoint #112281
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Adding a Virtual `SetTarget` Method to `System.Attribute` for Efficient Target Association #112245
  • [Android][Tests] Android library tests with content items fail: `Could not find a part of the path /data/data` #112558
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() returning Description same as Friendly name. #111520
  • JIT: Block clonning for subsequent bounds checks #112524
    10.0.0
  • Neighboring bounds checks aren't collapsed #109983
    10.0.0
  • unreliable codegen around vbroadcastss in .NET 8 release builds #96156
    8.0.x
  • [s390x] System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: OverflowException in LdapSessionOptions.ProtocolVersion on Big Endian #112390
  • WinForms Desktop application (.NET 8 & .NET 9) crashes randomly with corclr.dll errors #112598
    Future
  • Cannot reuse Unix Domain Socket on Windows #71291
    Future
  • Native AOT routine always calls vswhere/vsvars all and it ends up taking a lot of time #112648

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Clean-up reflection stack and unify type name parsers. #112670
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix `PipeWriter.AsStream(bool)` xmldoc #112669
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't use `Compiler::compFloatingPointUsed` to check if FP kills are needed #112668
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling CI for APX #112667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix exception handling in the prestub worker - take 2 #112666
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete old `GenTreeCall` ABI information #112665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use `fgCalledCount` for OSR method entry weight #112662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • testing CI #112661
    area-Build-mono
  • Handle overlapped groups of bounds checks #112660
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `LclVarDsc::GetArgReg` and `LclVarDsc::GetOtherArgReg` uses #112652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use osx.13.arm64.open queue for osx testing #112647
    needs-area-label
  • FileSystem: guard against stack overflow in recursive delete (#84344) #112644
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Narrow AddressFamily passed to getaddrinfo when IPv6 is unsupported #112642
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Use Avx10.2 Instructions in Floating Point Conversions #111775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up and optimize call arg lowering #112639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support `FIELD_LIST` for returns #112308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android] Fix java runner to not assume zip format when unzipping #112654
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow publishing AndroidSampleApp with R2R using in-build crossgen2 #112547
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Fix BMI peephole asserts #111837
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Clone blocks with bounds checks #112595
  • JIT: Use `fgCalledCount` in inlinee weight computation #112499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [System.DirectoryServices.Protocols] Fix ProtocolVersion Overflow on Big Endian Systems #112391
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Update DbDataSource.cs #112609
    area-System.Data, community-contribution

Updated

  • Implement ExportPkcs12 #112569
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix new EH hang on DebugBreak #112640
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Support disassembling single file bundle for ILSpy #112541
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • CoreCLR interpreter basic compilation and execution #112369
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate Vector.Dot for all base types #111853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112531
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.4
  • Use encode callback instead of renting a buffer to write to in DSAKeyFormatHelper #112638
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • Move some links to other doc #112574
    area-Meta
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand `Span<T>` capture #112543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Refactor around impDevirtualizeCall for GVM devirt #112610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update a few stresslogs for the frame identifiers #112555
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Enable containment for BMI2 shift and rotate instructions #111778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] remove EXPORT_EXCEPTION_HANDLING_HELPERS #111033
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConvertor` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix path to `dotnet.sh` in `AndroidSampleApp` project #112590
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Move generation of SuggestedBindingRedirects.targets to inner build #112487
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 9.0.4
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112530
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.15
  • More clean up to debugger attribute tests #112450
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: fix local assertion prop error for partial local comparisons #112539
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • JIT: Handle containment for shift instructions with EVEX encoding #111644
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize shift operations for BigInteger #112632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser] samplepoint instrumentation into Mono profiler #112352
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Emit `cmp (extended register)` on ARM64 to simplify cast-then-compare expressions #112411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] NativeAOT/Arm64: Do not overwrite gcinfo tracking registers for TLS #112549
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • Fold null checks against known non-null values #109164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TESTING ONLY] Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Use a unified cache for SSL_CTX objects #112567
    area-System.Net.Security
  • arm64: Change EQ/NE node to SETCC if the operand supports the zero flag #112235
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always track the context for late devirt #112396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set AppContext.BaseDirectory and the lookup path for AssemblyDirectory to the directory containing the NativeAOT module #112457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement the "compact dispatch sections" optimization from CoreCLR's ComWrappers implementation in NativeAOT's implementation #112461
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
